// ==UserScript==
// @name LimeTorrents
// @icon data:image/png;base64,
// @connect *://www.limetorrents.cc/*
// @trackerURL https://www.limetorrents.cc/
// @version 1.0
// @require exKit
// ==/UserScript==

var code = {
  "version": 2,
  "type": "kit",
  "title": "LimeTorrents",
  "icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
  "desc": "",
  "downloadUrl": "",
  "tVersion": "",
  "search": {
    "loginUrl": "",
    "loginFormSelector": "",
    "searchUrl": "https://www.limetorrents.cc/search/all/%search%/",
    "baseUrl": "https://www.limetorrents.cc/",
    "requestType": "GET",
    "listItemSelector": "table.table2>tbody>tr",
    "listItemSplice": [
      1,
      0
    ],
    "torrentSelector": {
      "categoryTitle": "td.tdnormal:eq(0)",
      "title": "td.tdleft>div.tt-name>a:eq(1)",
      "url": {
        "selector": "td.tdleft>div.tt-name>a:eq(1)",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "size": "td.tdnormal:eq(1)",
      "downloadUrl": {
        "selector": "td.tdleft>div.tt-name>a:eq(0)",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "seed": "td.tdseed",
      "peer": "td.tdleech"
    },
    "onGetValue": {
      "size": [
        "convertSize"
      ]
    }
  },
  "uid": 1638027109
};

API_exKit(code);
